# gontains

### Installation

```bash
go get github.com/caducorrea/gontains
```

### Use Gontains

Here is a minimal example usage that will search a item in a slice.

```go
package main

import (
    "fmt"

    "github.com/caducorrea/gontains"
)

func main() {
}
```
